items.translated_title: China’s Hesai will double production as lidar sensor industry shakes out
items.content: Hesai said it now plans to build as many as 4 million lidar sensors in 2026, up from 2 million, as it tries to corner a market with one fewer player after Luminar's bankruptcy.
